title: Kashmir Amritsar - The best of North India
text:
Kashmir Amritsar - The best of North India Kashmir Amritsar - The best of North India 0 
Northern India has some great options for travelers. Starting from Kashmir and ending at Punjab, a bounty of destinations are a part of what the north India tour packages pack for us. 
Kashmir has always been referred as the paradise on earth. It's an enchanting destination with beauty and color all around. You tend to sense that there is something special in this place just after entering Kashmir. The soil and the weather act in tandem with each other, to make the flowers colorful and beautiful. 
Moving from the beautiful Kashmir to other north Indian destinations, the north India tour operators cover a deluge of places to make this part of India exciting and full of discovery. Packages like Shimla -Manali - Kullu, Jammu- Vaishnodevi - Amritsar, Mussoorie - Haridwar, Only Kashmir and Kashmir -Vaishnodevi let the traveler cover a combination of places in one single package. 
Hence the beauty of Kashmir and the warmth and mouthwatering food of Punjab can be experienced on the same vacation. 
Southern Travels, a leading domestic tours operator based in New Delhi offers various north India tour packages. It assembles some of the best places out of North India together. 
The Kashmir Amritsar holiday package by Southern Travels is a wonderful travel opportunity packed together for eight days. The tour is also known as Enchanting Kashmir and covers a spate of places like Srinagar, Pahalgam, Vaishno Devi, Gulmarg and Amritsar. 
Srinagar is also known as the summer capital of Jammu and Kashmir. Situated in the valley of Kashmir, it lies on the banks of Jhelum River. The city is popular for its gardens, lakes, houseboats, dry fruits and for intricate traditional Kashmiri handicrafts. Dal Lake is a famous tourist spot in Srinagar and is iconic of Kashmir. 
Gulmarg is another destination that adds to the charm of Kashmir. It is the heartland of winter sports in India and has been rated by CNN International as Asia's seventh best ski destination. It attracts a lot of outdoor sports enthusiasts with its showcase of trekking, golfing, horse riding, fishing and water skiing. With so many sports activities to experience, Gulmarg is truly the outdoor sports epicenter of India. 
Gulmarg is also known as a place that has torrential snowfall that makes the entire city snow clad during the winters. Another destination covered by the Enchanting Kashmir package is Pahalgam, which is a tourist spot in the Anantnag district of Jammu and Kashmir. Pahalgam is also a famous shooting spot for Bollywood movies and also is the starting point of the Amarnath Yatra, which is a 16 km long journey from Pahalgam. 
A traveler also gets to experience Punjab in this package. Amritsar is the last destination in the Enchanting Kashmir package. The city is popular for the Sikh shrine "Golden Temple" which attracts a lot of visitors all around the year. The city is also a great option for foodies as the Punjabi food cuisine is available in abundance here. Starting from Amritsari Kulcha to Fish fry to Tandoori Chicken to Lassi, the bliss of variety food options cannot go amiss in Amritsar. The North India tours are an amazing option for tourists to make the most of the regions of North India. The beauty, charm, spirituality, warmth, architectural and natural bliss of northern India can let you traverse a different world altogether. These packages take you away from the daily rigors, the busy metropolitan life and lets you breathe a sigh of fresh air away from the hassles of daily life. Rate this Article
